page.title: 02Cortachy School,Cortachy.
page.content: {Our school}is a small{rural primary with,at present,{29}pupils and{2 teachers.There are visiting teachers of{Art,Music and P.E.Once a week the {minister visits}to conduct a short service.We have ten weekly swimming lessons at{Forfar}Baths,which we are taken to by bus. Those children who live some distance away are provided with {transport}to and from school. In addition to the two classrooms, the school also has a{dining-room and {a General Purposes Room}where we watch T.V.and have Music and P.E.lessons. After completing P.7.pupils move on to{Webster's High School}in{Kirriemuir to commence their{secondary education.
